attributes.action: UK based business to only employ people in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
It's quite simple - if a business only supplies it's services within the UK, why should I employ people outside of our shores ?
Example being Cable TV or Broadband services. These services are only for UK customers, yet some companies like Virgin Media have call centres in Pune, Delhi, Bangalore, Manila etc.

So lets get these companies 100% onshore
